title: Bombed Gaza hospital owned by the Anglican Communion
description: The al-Ahli Hospital in Gaza City was also struck Saturday and had braced to be a key support in the war.

title: Maduro, Venezuelan opposition agree to freer election in 2024
description: The deal, signed in the presence of U.S. officials, is expected to clear the way for the Biden administration to ease oil sanctions on the authoritarian state.

title: She escaped the Hamas festival attack, then told a D.C. synagogue her story
description: Noa Ben Artzi, speaking Tuesday alongside congressional leaders, recounted her narrow survival from the Hamas massacre. “Thirty people fell on top of me,” she said.

title: Why aid for Gaza is still stuck near Rafah crossing in Egypt
description: The link between Egypt and Gaza is the main route for possible aid convoys and an exit for people seeking to flee the besieged Palestinian territory.

title: Visualizing the size of Gaza City compared with U.S. cities
description: Gaza City has a higher population density than any major U.S. city.

title: Family of hostage Mia Shem pleads for her release after Hamas video
description: The 21-year-old French-Israeli woman vanished Oct. 7 from a music festival attacked by militants. International leaders joined her family in urging for her to be let go.

title: Israeli tanks add drone protection cages, a lesson from Ukraine war
description: The protective measure, some analysts say, appears to have been implemented after Hamas used armed drones to target Israeli soldiers and armored vehicles.

title: Putin meets Viktor Orban in China, in a boost for the Kremlin
description: Orban, a self-proclaimed proponent of “illiberal” democracy, has vexed European Union and NATO partners with his opposition to sanctions and cozy ties to the Russian leader.

title: Before the U.S. recognized Israel, a president’s friend pushed the cause
description: Eddie Jacobson had a favor to ask President Harry S. Truman in March 1949: Recognize Israel as a Jewish independent state.

title: Chinese fighter jets buzz U.S. planes in dramatic new videos
description: The Pentagon released videos and photos of over a dozen maneuvers by Chinese fighter jets to harass unarmed U.S. reconnaissance planes in international airspace.

title: Navalny lawyer flees Russia, leaving opposition leader alone in court
description: Opposition leader appeared at a hearing without representation after three of his lawyers were arrested on extremism charges, and two others left the country.

title: Why are Israel and Hamas at war? A basic explainer.
description: Another potential flash point is Israel’s northern border with Lebanon, where a second front risks opening up between Israel and Hezbollah.

title: Ukraine used long-range ATACMS to strike Russian depot and aircraft
description: The overnight strike was Ukraine’s first known use of the U.S.-made weapon, which Kyiv had been requested for more than a year.

title: U.S. sending sailors, Marines toward Israel, defense officials say
description: The Bataan Amphibious Ready Group of U.S. sailors and Marines will be positioned near Israel, in the hope of preventing the conflict with Hamas from expanding.

title: Israel’s Gaza evacuation call could breach international law, U.N. says
description: The U.N. warning comes as President Biden visits the region and humanitarian aid for Gaza is stranded on the Egyptian border.

title: As traumatized southern Israel evacuates, residents ponder revenge
description: Sderot has long been on the front lines but the last Hamas attack was something utterly different, and residents want the situation to change.

title: Mideast teeters on the brink of wider war as Iran ponders its options
description: Fears that the Gaza war could trigger a wider, more devastating Mideast conflict are growing as clashes with Hezbollah intensify amid warnings from Tehran.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Blinken confirms Biden to visit Israel, as crisis in Gaza intensifies
description: President Biden will visit Israel on Wednesday to show solidarity and address the growing humanitarian needs of civilians in Gaza. A trip to Jordan will follow.

title: After election, Poland may turn the illiberal tide
description: Poland’s nationalist ruling party has been headed for defeat. But once the opposition is able to take power, they face a complicated task unwinding eight years of hardening illiberalism in the Polish state.

title: For Gazan workers stranded in Israel, being apart from family is agony
description: Gazan workers stranded in Israel have sought refuge among fellow Palestinians in the West Bank, uniting across political and geographic divides.
